review.text: The article addresses a contingent problem and very relevant, and includes both a diagnosis use of good practices as a solution (concrete good practices)...
The article presents recommendations practices for secure software development...

The topic is very cool. Also, Ya I know I give off HOT DAD vibes. there is only 2 options and that love it and act like it or hate but deep down you know you love that energy I just seem to have (don't lie to yourself)...
